subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Ryan Boatright had 19 points, and No. 17 Connecticut held off the College of Charleston, 65-57, in the first round of the Puerto Rico Tip-Off on Thursday.
snippet: Ryan Boatright had 19 points, and No. 17 Connecticut held off the College of Charleston, 65-57, in the first round of the Puerto Rico Tip-Off on Thursday.
